thread.title: Hetty Foureyes Hoover
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Hetty Foureyes Hoover

author: Hetty Foureyes Hoover
title: Hetty Foureyes Hoover
text: The appointment for the collection of my vehicle was arranged for pick up between 0800-0900, at 0920 I cancelled the appointment as I had to leave for work. They did try and tell me it was booked in between 0800-10.00 but that is not what I arranged, and not what was stated in the numerous text messages and emails. Would I use again? No.
